description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Copenhagen 2016
http://gotocph.com

Scott Hanselman - Principal Program Manager at Microsoft

ABSTRACT
Scott Hanselman has been a Type 1 diabetic for over 20 years. Join him as he discusses the promising state of diabetes technology [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:

title: Solving Diabetes with Open Source Software & Hardware
